general_footer.description: In tune with souls on the path to adulthood, Speakers at the Factory always listens to the sounds of friends telling about the product, and also the stories in each person's life. That's what Loudspeakers At The Factory always strives for.

home_hero.subtitle: Manufactured at the factory - Stable prices - Free shipping within the city - Nationwide warranty

home_join.title: Be a Part of Something Special in Life!
